{

  "Strengths": "Effective approach to graph adversarial attacks, scalable and adaptable to different graph settings, good performance in degrading GNNs.",
  "Weaknesses": "None explicitly mentioned, but the authors assume a specific metric (Modified Silhouette Score) to guide attacks, which might have limitations.",
  "Questions": "How generalizable is the Modified Silhouette Score across different graph types? Can the approach be further improved to handle more complex graph structures?"
}
